thread.title: Is Drew Brees' cap hit sustainable for Saints? | Black and Gold Today
thread.title_full: Is Drew Brees' cap hit sustainable for Saints? | Black and Gold Today | NOLA.com

author: Jim Derry, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Is Drew Brees' cap hit sustainable for Saints? | Black and Gold Today
text:
There was plenty of talk Wednesday about Drew Brees restructuring his contract and what it means for the New Orleans Saints . But does it mean all that much?
On Wednesday's late edition of the Black and Gold Today , NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune Saints columnist Jeff Duncan joins Jim Derry via Skype to discuss the move and how it will play out in the future. Also, we explain how much cap space Brees' contract will take up and the trade with the Patriots for tight end Michael Hoomanawanui.
In the Extra Point segment, we look (tongue in cheek) at what the Saints might be able to accomplish if Brees' cap hit remains $30 million.
